statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT payment_date, payment_method FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_method FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT user_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_payment > 500;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_method, payment_amount, payment_date FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM transaction_logs JOIN payment_history ON transaction_logs.transaction_id = payment_history.transaction_id;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, payment_date, payment_method FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, payment_status FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_status ASC, payment_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount <= 500 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email_address FROM user_details ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_method FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, user_name, phone_number FROM user_details WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, payment_amount FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT user_name, email_address FROM user_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, email_address, phone_number FROM user_details JOIN payment_history ON user_details.user_id = payment_history.transaction_id WHERE payment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_name, COUNT(payment_id) as payment_count FROM user_details JOIN payment_history ON user_details.user_id = payment_history.transaction_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING payment_count > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount < 50);
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM payment_details ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT audit_message, audit_date FROM audit_logs WHERE transaction_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT payment_method, payment_status FROM payment_details WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
SELECT audit_message, audit_date FROM audit_logs WHERE transaction_id = 1001 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT log_id, action, user_id FROM audit_logs ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT username, role, last_login FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_details GROUP BY payment_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_accounts WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
